description:
Run AI models locally. One-click install w/ zero configuration.


●
Bug Fixes & Improvements
●
Fixed "Fetch failed" error on Mobile Apps and Website
●
Fixed continue not working on sentences that end in punctuation.
●
Fix for people, especially in non-US regions, who have had issues sending messages on the chat page
●
Refactored model loading & streaming to recover from errors more easily
●
Under the hood improvements to improve stability across Desktop, Mobile, and the Website
●
Fix for people who are unable to sign in on the Desktop app
●
Fix for people who are having issues viewing settings pages on the Desktop app
●
Under the hood improvements to prepare for Backyard Parties 👀
